00025 if (defined('LIGHTWEIGHT_MODE')) {
00026     header('Location: index.php');
00027 }
00028 
00029 // required file
00030 require LIB_DIR.'admin_logon.inc.php';
00031 
00032 // https connection (if enabled)
00033 if ($sysconf['https_enable']) {
00034     simbio_security::doCheckHttps($sysconf['https_port']);
00035 }
00036 
00037 // check if session browser cookie already exists
00038 if (isset($_COOKIE['admin_logged_in'])) {
00039     header('location: admin/index.php');
00040 }
00041 
00042 // start the output buffering for main content
00043 ob_start();
00044 
00045 // if there is login action
00046 if (isset($_POST['logMeIn'])) {
00047     $username = trim(strip_tags($_POST['userName']));
00048     $password = trim(strip_tags($_POST['passWord']));
00049     if (!$username OR !$password) {
00050         echo '<script type="text/javascript">alert(\''.__('Please supply valid username and password').'\');</script>';
00051     } else {
00052         // destroy previous session set in OPAC
00053         simbio_security::destroySessionCookie(null, SENAYAN_MEMBER_SESSION_COOKIES_NAME, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR, false);
00054         require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00055         // regenerate session ID to prevent session hijacking
00056         session_regenerate_id(true);
00057         // create logon class instance
00058         $logon = new admin_logon($username, $password);
00059         if ($logon->adminValid($dbs)) {
00060             // set cookie admin flag
00061             setcookie('admin_logged_in', true, time()+14400, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR);
00062             // write log
00063             utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $username, 'Login', 'Login success for user '.$username.' from address '.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
00064             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00065             echo 'alert(\''.__('Welcome to Library Automation,').$logon->real_name.'\');';
00066             echo 'location.href = \'admin/index.php\';';
00067             echo '</script>';
00068             exit();
00069         } else {
00070             // write log
00071             utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $username, 'Login', 'Login FAILED for user '.$username.' from address '.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
00072             // message
00073             $msg = '<script type="text/javascript">';
00074             $msg .= 'alert(\''.__('Wrong Username or Password. ACCESS DENIED').'\');';
00075             $msg .= 'history.back();';
00076             $msg .= '</script>';
00077             simbio_security::destroySessionCookie($msg, SENAYAN_SESSION_COOKIES_NAME, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin', false);
00078             exit();
00079         }
00080     }
00081 }
00082 ?>

00084 <div id="loginForm">
00085     <noscript>
00086         <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #FF0000;"><?php echo __('Your browser does not support Javascript or Javascript is disabled. Application won\'t run without Javascript!'); ?><div>
00087     </noscript>
00088     <form action="index.php?p=login" method="post">
00089     <div class="heading1">Username</div>
00090     <div><input type="text" name="userName" style="width: 80%;" /></div>
00091     <div class="heading1 marginTop">Password</div>
00092     <div><input type="password" name="passWord" style="width: 80%;" /></div>
00093     <div class="marginTop"><input type="submit" name="logMeIn" value="Logon" id="loginButton" />
00094         <input type="button" value="Home" id="homeButton" onclick="javascript: location.href = 'index.php';" />
00095     </div>
00096     </form>

00099 <?php
00100 // main content
00101 $main_content = ob_get_clean();
00102 
00103 // page title
00104 $page_title = $sysconf['library_name'].' :: Library Automation LOGIN';
00105 
00106 if ($sysconf['template']['base'] == 'html') {
00107     // create the template object
00108     $template = new simbio_template_parser($sysconf['template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['template']['theme'].'/login_template.html');
00109     // assign content to markers
00110     $template->assign('<!--PAGE_TITLE-->', $page_title);
00111     $template->assign('<!--CSS-->', $sysconf['template']['css']);
00112     $template->assign('<!--MAIN_CONTENT-->', $main_content);
00113     // print out the template
00114     $template->printOut();
00115 } else if ($sysconf['template']['base'] == 'php') {
00116     require_once $sysconf['template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['template']['theme'].'/login_template.inc.php';
00117 }
